documentation.text: @dev Standard ERC20 token with supports minting and burning tokens.

@dev Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`.
 - the caller must have the `MINTER_ROLE`.
@dev Destroys `amount` tokens from the caller's balance.

@dev Destroys `amount` tokens from `account`, deducting from the caller's
 allowance.
 - the caller must have allowance for ``account``'s tokens of at least
 `amount`.

@dev Pause transferring, minting, burning tokens.
 - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.

@dev Resume transferring, minting, burning tokens.
 - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.

@dev Set trusted forwarder address for gsn.
 - `trustedForwarder` can be zero address to disable gsn
@dev Return minter role unique id. Used for managing minter role at contract {AccessControl}
@dev Return pauser role unique id. Used for managing pauser role at contract {AccessControl}

attributes.text: @dev Standard ERC20 token with supports minting and burning tokens.

@dev Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`.
 - the caller must have the `MINTER_ROLE`.
@dev Destroys `amount` tokens from the caller's balance.

@dev Destroys `amount` tokens from `account`, deducting from the caller's
 allowance.
 - the caller must have allowance for ``account``'s tokens of at least
 `amount`.

@dev Pause transferring, minting, burning tokens.
 - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.

@dev Resume transferring, minting, burning tokens.
 - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.

@dev Set trusted forwarder address for gsn.
 - `trustedForwarder` can be zero address to disable gsn
@dev Return minter role unique id. Used for managing minter role at contract {AccessControl}
@dev Return pauser role unique id. Used for managing pauser role at contract {AccessControl}

devdoc.details: Standard ERC20 token with supports minting and burning tokens.

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default. This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets `amount` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. IMPORTANT: Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729 Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

burn(uint256).details: Destroys `amount` tokens from the caller's balance.

burnFrom(address,uint256).details: Destroys `amount` tokens from `account`, deducting from the caller's allowance. - the caller must have allowance for ``account``'s tokens of at least `amount`.

mint(address,uint256).details: Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`. - the caller must have the `MINTER_ROLE`.

minterRole().details: Return minter role unique id. Used for managing minter role at contract {AccessControl}

pause().details: Pause transferring, minting, burning tokens. - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.

pauserRole().details: Return pauser role unique id. Used for managing pauser role at contract {AccessControl}

setTrustedForwarder(address).details: Set trusted forwarder address for gsn. - `trustedForwarder` can be zero address to disable gsn

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Moves `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Moves `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` using the allowance mechanism. `amount` is then deducted from the caller's allowance. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

unpause().details: Resume transferring, minting, burning tokens. - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.
